file.name: api.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: '0.1'
  title: Jupyter Notifications API
  license:
    name: Modified BSD License
servers:
  - url: 'http://localhost:8888/api/'
paths:
  /notifications:
    post:
      summary: Add notification
      description: Allows you to add single notification
      operationId: addNotification
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/INotificationEvent'
      responses:
        '201':
          description: notificationId assigned by the server
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: integer
        default:
          description: unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
    get:
      summary: Returns an array of notification objects stored
      operationId: getNotifs
      parameters:
        - name: created
          in: query
          description: Get notifications created after certain ms since epoch
          schema:
            type: integer
        - name: origin
          in: query
          description: Get notifications from the origin
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Requested notifications
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/INotificationResponse'
        default:
          description: unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
  '/notifications/{id}':
    get:
      summary: Get a notification by Id
      operationId: getNotif
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: id
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            minimum: 0
      responses:
        '200':
          description: notification with requested Id
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/INotificationResponse'
        default:
          description: unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
components:
  schemas:
    INotificationEvent:
      type: object
      required:
        - origin
        - title
        - body
      properties:
        origin:
          type: string
        title:
          type: string
        body:
          type: string
        linkUrl:
          type: string
        ephemeral:
          type: boolean
        notifTimeout:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        notifType:
          type: string
    INotificationResponse:
      type: object
      required:
        - notificationId
        - origin
        - title
      properties:
        notificationId:
          type: integer
        origin:
          type: string
        title:
          type: string
        body:
          type: string
        linkUrl:
          type: string
        ephemeral:
          type: boolean
        notifTimeout:
          type: integer
        notifType:
          type: string
        created:
          type: string
    Error:
      type: object
      required:
        - code
        - message
      properties:
        code:
          type: integer
        message:
          type: string
  securitySchemes:
    bearerAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
security:
  - bearerAuth: []
